description: I have had the pleasure of interacting with Barsha in various Twitter Spaces and I can confidently say that they are a valuable asset to any community. Barsha is always asking insightful questions and providing valuable insights and knowledge. Their contributions to the conversation are always well thought out and demonstrate a deep understanding of the topic at hand. Barsha is a true asset to any community, always eager to help and lend their expertise.
